description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join Xanthus in his journey to take revenge for his tribe and see the down fall of a tyrant. Gladiators Escapade brought to you by Drop Dead Interactive is a puzzle / maze, action game full of exciting dungeons to explore and escape.
